column1: You can exclude any specific CMS, Category, and Product pages from HTML sitemap on the corresponding grids, or on their Edit pages (%linkProduct, %linkCategory, %linkPage).
column2: You can exclude any specific CMS, Category, and Product pages from HTML sitemap on the corresponding grids, or on their Edit pages (%linkProduct, %linkCategory, %linkPage).

column1: This setting was added by MageWorx HTML Sitemap
column2: This setting was added by MageWorx HTML Sitemap

column1: Manages the maximum depth of the categories to show. Leave empty for default (all categories).
column2: Manages the maximum depth of the categories to show. Leave empty for default (all categories).

column1: If Enabled, HTML Sitemap includes products so that every product is being displayed under the appropriate category. Any Product can be excluded manually. Keep it disabled if you have a big number of products.
column2: If Enabled, HTML Sitemap includes products so that every product is being displayed under the appropriate category. Any Product can be excluded manually. Keep it disabled if you have a big number of products.

column1: According to the category display mode
column2: According to the category display mode

column1:
A comma-delimited list of links and link labels to append to the sitemap. Example:
http://www.mageworx.com,MageWorx.
Link without 'http[s]://' will be treated as relative to this domain.
NOTE! http[s]:// is required in case the page is on some other website
column2:
A comma-delimited list of links and link labels to append to the sitemap. Example:
http://www.mageworx.com,MageWorx.
Link without 'http[s]://' will be treated as relative to this domain.
NOTE! http[s]:// is required in case the page is on some other website

column1: You can exclude any specific CMS, Category, and Product pages from HTML sitemap on the corresponding grids, or on their Edit pages (Product, Category, CMS).
column2: You can exclude any specific CMS, Category, and Product pages from HTML sitemap on the corresponding grids, or on their Edit pages (Product, Category, CMS).

column1: NOTE! The trailing slash can be added to pages without suffix .html or .htm
column2: NOTE! The trailing slash can be added to pages without suffix .html or .htm

column1: <b>NOTE!<b> The trailing slash can be added to pages without suffix .html or .htm
column2: <b>NOTE!<b> The trailing slash can be added to pages without suffix .html or .htm
